short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension counts exactly how much time you spend watching Netflix, even on a second screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps you keep track of how much you watch Netflix.

It counts exactly how much time you spend watching and shows a badge with the number of minutes you watched today. It stops counting when you pause, but keeps counting if you're playing in another window (e.g. on a second monitor).

Source code: https://github.com/fwouts/netflix-time-tracker
